question.title: Multiples of 2 and 3
question.content:
Find and return the sum of all elements in an array which are either divisible by 2 or by 3.

Input Format :
Line 1: N + 1 integers, where 1st integer denotes the size of array N and next N are elements of the array, separated by spaces
Output Format:
A single integer denotes the sum of all those numbers which satisfy the specified condition.
Constraints :
1<= N <=10^5)
Sample Input 1:
4 
3 5 6 7
Sample Output 1:
9

rephrased.body: Given an array of integers, find the sum of all elements that are divisible by either 2 or 3.
constraints: 1 <= N <= 10^5, where N is the size of the array.

testcases.explanation: The array is [3, 5, 6, 7]. The numbers divisible by 2 or 3 are 3 and 6. Their sum is 3 + 6 = 9.
